name: Tropical Pineapple Turkey Meatballs
description: Take turkey to the tropics! Turkey is a lean meat, so it provides all the protein you need to fuel your day but has a lower fat content than ground beef. Sweet pineapple and tons of veggies round out this quick and easy steamer meal, so dinner is a breeze! Shake on Poke Bowl Topper Blend for a sodium-free salt replacer.

ingredients.name: Tropical Pineapple Chicken Seasoning or Sweet Garlic Chicken Seasoning

preparation: Peel sweet potato and dice into small cubes. Peel and chop red onion. Place both in Round Steamer; stir in melted coconut oil. Cover and microwave on high for 5 min.
Meanwhile, in large bowl, combine turkey with 1 tbsp seasoning. Form into 16 meatballs (about 2 scant tbsp each).

Drain pineapple and discard liquid. Remove steamer from microwave and stir in remaining seasoning, pineapple, and frozen vegetables. Top with meatballs (it’s okay if they touch). Cover and microwave on high for 6 min.
Remove steamer from microwave. Using Sauté Spoon, gently stir and spoon pan juices over meatballs. Cover and microwave on high for additional 2 min. Let sit 2 min before removing lid.

products.name: Tropical Pineapple Chicken Seasoning (3pk)
summary: We love a Sheet Pan meal, and this one is on heavy rotation with Epicure staff! It’s so quick to make, juicy, and packed with flavour, and it’s great for meal prep. It’s also customizable. Swap pineapple for mango or peaches, use the veggies from your crisper, and serve it with rice or quinoa or in wraps. Make it work for you!

products.name: Sweet Garlic Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Sweet & garlicky, family-friendly meal that goes from raw-to-ready in 20 minutes.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Sauté Spoon
summary: Stir it up! The ultimate kitchen tool for stirring, sautéing, and serving, this sturdy spoon will soon replace all the other ones taking up space in your drawers. Built with a flat head, it’s great for scraping bowls and easy to store.
